meanings.definition: A person who suffers from depression.
meanings.sent1: Many depressives benefit from therapy sessions.
meanings.sent2: The support group was full of depressives sharing their experiences.
meanings.sent3: Why did the depressive bring a ladder to the therapy session? To climb out of sadness!
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds seemed to follow the depressive wherever they went.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid portrait of a depressive lost in thought.

meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed new depressives for the patient.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy stocked a variety of depressives for different needs.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bottle of depressives refuse to open? It was feeling down!
meanings.sent4: The pills worked like magic, lifting the depressive's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the depressives caught the eye of the customer.
